wrote:
>
> Hi Rebecca,
> I asked my son Sett, and he said Jak needs to have a full light eco
meter first and that you
> need to press the L2 and the o or x (he wasn't sure which one it was)
at the same time.
>
> Hope this helps :)
> -Denise and Settimio
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We've been trying that, do you know if you have to have all of the dark
eco powers before you can get the light ones?

Thanx

~Rebecca

messages.subject: Re: OT Jak3(ps2) question
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rebecca, I asked my son Sett, and he said Jak needs to have a full light eco meter first and that you need to press the L2 and the o or x (he wasn t sure
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rebecca,
I asked my son Sett, and he said Jak needs to have a full light eco meter first and that you
need to press the L2 and the o or x (he wasn't sure which one it was) at the same time.

Hope this helps :)
-Denise and Settimio







--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "phred" <elfmama_2@y...> wrote:
>
> Hi Jaiden(7) just bought Jak3 last night and has been playing it almost
> nonstop since last night, he is having a small problem.
>
> We can't figure out how to turn Jak into Light Jak, the book says when
> the meter has any amount of light eco press the L2 and function button
> (o or x...) and that should bring out Light Jak, so far, it's not
> working and he's getting upset. Are we doing something wrong?
>
> Anybody know?
>
> Thanx!
> ~Rebecca
>

messages.subject: OT Jak3(ps2) question
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jaiden(7) just bought Jak3 last night and has been playing it almost nonstop since last night, he is having a small problem. We can t figure out how to turn
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jaiden(7) just bought Jak3 last night and has been playing it almost
nonstop since last night, he is having a small problem.

We can't figure out how to turn Jak into Light Jak, the book says when
the meter has any amount of light eco press the L2 and function button
(o or x...) and that should bring out Light Jak, so far, it's not
working and he's getting upset. Are we doing something wrong?

Anybody know?

Thanx!
~Rebecca
